notes: Very modern, renovated apartment with clean finishes, built-in wooden cabinetry, modern appliances including Panasonic washer-dryer, induction cooktop, and large refrigerator. The space appears baby-safe with no visible balcony hazards, rounded furniture edges, and good natural light through multiple windows. An intercom system with video is present suggesting a secure building; floor 6 of 11 strongly implies elevator access.
